params.name: pretrained_model_name_or_path
params.description: This can be either:a string, the model id of a pretrained feature_extractor hosted inside a model repo onhuggingface.co.a path to a directory containing a feature extractor file saved using thesave_pretrained() method, e.g., ./my_model_directory/.a path or url to a saved feature extractor JSON file, e.g.,./my_model_directory/preprocessor_config.json.

params.name: *kwargs
params.description: Additional keyword arguments passed along to both SequenceFeatureExtractor andPreTrainedTokenizer
